long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Dataino Serial Chrome App interface your Arduino via serial / USB and through www.dataino.it you can create controls, send data and receive value from Arduino .

1 - Register on www.dataino.it
2 - Create the interface
3 - Copy Code and paste in Arduino IDE
4 - Connet via serial or ethernet
